column3: While we will likely end up doing this for 22.0,  concept NACK on switching compilers in the RC stage of a release. I'm somewhat surprised this works as is. Normally there are other minor changes required, like adjusting a path, or fixing up a `.so` name etc, however that's good to know.

> While we will likely end up doing this for 22.0, concept NACK on switching compilers in the RC stage of a release.

Correct. My intention is to get this merged into the master branch, not into the 0.21. For the 0.21 branch I've already ACKed #20447.

This has been my preferred way to resolve this from the beginning.

Code review ACK 5ebb747d2a147fd9500f282104936a4a79075c58
Did not check determinism though.
